content.description: Extends up a face on small pockets (1-3 fingers) and smearing.
content.location: Continues up from the anchors shared by Gopher Baroque and American Express.

climbs.name: Shackling the Masses with Drastic Rap Tactics

content.description:
Start in an easy right-facing corner with good cracks to the first bolt on the steep face above. Punch through three stacked roofs above. Each roof presents its own unique challenges.

A classy line offering very diverse moves requiring power endurance, finesse, and crafty maneuvering--this line is right up there with White Knight and Pangs of Battle as one of the Canyon's best hard sport routes!

Clay Stoner and Adam Gable also helped get this route going.
content.location:
Tackles the obvious large roofs on the right side of the massive yellow pillar which forms the right side of the Happy Trails Wall.

Hike past the pillar on the main canyon trail before cutting up and right on a faint path to the base.

content.description: Scramble up 30' to belay on a large ledge. Start up the moderate blocky lower 1/2 of Roy Rogers to a small ledge and cut right into the square-cut, overhung, right-leaning and right-facing dihedral. This corner requires a good deal of thought and finesse and offers lots of variety despite its short length--a unique climb for the canyon.
content.protection: Gear to #3 Camalot for lower section, 4 bolts on upper section, shuts.
content.location: On the right side of Happy Trails Wall, shares start with Roy Rogers.

content.description: Extension of this route is provided by Towhee a mixed trad/sport route.
content.protection: Bolts. Shares anchors with American Express.
content.location: To the right of American Express on the Happy Trails Wall.

content.description: A slightly overhung, right leaning fingers to hands crack boulder. This problem isn't very tall, but makes for some cold weather climbing when there isn't much else to get on. Grade could be way off since it was rated in 35F weather.
content.location: Found on the uphill side of the trail and below the happy trails wall. A very obvious crack only 5ft off the trail.

content.description: Extension of American Express provided by Towhee, a mixed trad/sport route above.
